exceptions.exn: No such bound variable cs (possible names are: A, A0, A1, eqA, plusA, invA, minusA, multA, divA, n, ltM, p and q).

original: intros l Hcan1 Hcan2 Hcan3. apply eqp_imp_canonical with (cs:=cs) (ltM:=ltM). - apply eqp_trans with (q:=(pluspf (fst l) (pluspf (fst (snd l)) (snd (snd l))))). + apply plusTerm_is_pX. apply ltP_refl_pX; auto. + apply eqp_refl. apply cs. - now apply sumCanonical1. - now apply sumCanonical2. - auto. - auto. - auto. - auto.
